title: I DJ'd At A Famous Night Club & Only Played Beethoven
description: In this video, Max Fosh DJs at a famous night club but only plays Beethoven's music throughout the night.
summary: Max Fosh DJs at a famous night club and surprises the crowd by only playing Beethoven's music.
payoff: The payoff comes when the crowd initially reacts negatively to the classical music but eventually starts to enjoy it and dance along, showing that good music transcends genres and expectations.
